This week's #TidyTuesday is on Avatar: The Last Airbender, which is quite popular at my house! üåäüåèüî•üí®

In this screencast, check out how to build an #rstats model using dialogue from the show, plus how to compute model-agnostic variable importance.
https://t.co/JX5Jub9Hzf

Bivariate choropleth maps are great to show relations between two variables. The tmap #rstats package doesn't implement bivariate maps yet, but with some additional coding they can be done. See examples at https://t.co/t1dZxVvODN based on the work of @maps4thought #tmap #rspatial https://t.co/AlAeFd19lD
